column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I came here recently (during covid) around lunch time and it wasn't super packed
column2: but thankfully other patrons were still there giving their business! On a beautiful day
column3: this space is stunning as the natural light comes into the building in droves. I sat at the bar
column4: and was able to sit down and order immediately from the bartender (full menu). He was kind
column6: and the bar (entire space really) was super clean - a plus during the pandemic.
